text:
limit use of contraception use in women include fear of side effects; partner
disapproval; the absence of menses; abstinence; and low perception of pregnancy risk.
 These aspects must be included in the discussion.
• Counselling tools are available and complement the process.
• Group and individual education are advised.
o Verbal information can be reinforced with health education videos in the waiting rooms and written
